lead_paragraph: Veteran Joe Johnson signed with the Miami Heat on Saturday and on Sunday the versatile swing man was thrown right into the fire, delivering in a victory over the New York Knicks at Madison Square Garden.

headline.print_headline: Johnson Makes Hot Start to Heat Life as Miami Burn Knicks
headline.main: Johnson Makes Hot Start to Heat Life as Miami Burn Knicks

snippet: Veteran Joe Johnson signed with the Miami Heat on Saturday and on Sunday the versatile swing man was thrown right into the fire, delivering in a victory over the New York Knicks at Madison Square Garden....
